TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HostSecurityManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许控制和自定义应用程序域的安全行为。

span.span: Allows the control and customization of security behavior for application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建一个新，公共语言运行时查询是否存在，后者参与安全决策。When you create a new , the common language runtime queries the for the presence of a , which participates in making security decisions for the . 宿主提供程序应实现继承自的主机安全管理器类。Host providers should implement a host security manager that inherits from the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的非常简单实现。The following example shows a very simple implementation of a . [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#1)]

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

para.span: 某些成员每当程序集加载时，隐式或显式调用。

span.span: Some members of a are called whenever an assembly is loaded, either implicitly or explicitly.

para.span: 和方法必须加载任何程序集，因为这样将导致的成员递归调用。

span.span: The and methods must not load any assemblies, because doing so will result in the members of the being recursively called.

para.span: 为了避免循环引用，你应该创建可能会导致要加载程序集，隐式或显式，派生自的类的构造函数中的类的新实例。

span.span: To avoid circular references, you should create new instances of classes that can cause assemblies to be loaded, either implicitly or explicitly, in the constructor of a class that derives from .

span.span: Create instances of classes that can cause assemblies to be loaded, either explicitly or implicitly, in this constructor.

para.span: Get 访问器属性和和只要程序集的加载，并且其后续加载的程序集将会导致循环引用，就调用方法。

span.span: The get accessor for the property and the and methods are called whenever an assembly is loaded, and their subsequent loading of assemblies will cause circular references.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust DetermineApplicationTrust (System.Security.Policy.Evidence applicationEvidence, System.Security.Policy.Evidence activatorEvidence, System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext context);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust DetermineApplicationTrust(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence applicationEvidence, class System.Security.Policy.Evidence activatorEvidence, class System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext context) cil managed
Public Overridable Function DetermineApplicationTrust (applicationEvidence As Evidence, activatorEvidence As Evidence, context As TrustManagerContext) As ApplicationTrust

public: virtual System::Security::Policy::ApplicationTrust ^ DetermineApplicationTrust(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ applicationEvidence, System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ activatorEvidence, System::Security::Policy::TrustManagerContext ^ context);

param.name: applicationEvidence
param.span: 要激活的应用程序的证据。

span.span: The evidence for the application to be activated.

param.name: activatorEvidence
param.span: 也可以是正在激活的应用程序域的证据。

span.span: Optionally, the evidence for the activating application domain.
The trust context.

summary.span: 决定是否应执行应用程序。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed.

returns.span: 一个对象，包含有关应用程序的信任信息。

span.span: An object that contains trust information about the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现调用应用程序的安全管理器，以确定是否应执行应用程序。The base implementation calls the application security manager to determine if the application should be executed. 基实现，不使用的激活器证据。The base implementation does not use the activator evidence. 但是，重写的实现可以使用的激活器证据来确定尝试要激活应用程序的应用程序域的安全证据。However, an overridden implementation could use the activator evidence to determine the security evidence for the application domain attempting to activate the application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写自定义主机安全管理器的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#3)]

span.span: The grant set does not contain the minimum request set specified by the .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel DomainPolicy { get; }
.property instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel DomainPolicy
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DomainPolicy As PolicyLevel
public: virtual property System::Security::Policy::PolicyLevel ^ DomainPolicy { System::Security::Policy::PolicyLevel ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取当前应用程序域的安全策略。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the security policy for the current application domain.

value.span: 当前应用程序域的安全策略。

span.span: The security policy for the current application domain.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此属性。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 此基实现总是返回 `null`。The base implementation always returns `null`. 在调用此属性创建时间。This property is called at creation time. 它允许主机提供当前策略。It allows a host to supply a policy for the current . 策略级别由以下内容组成：A policy level consists of the following: - 一组代码组组织到一个取得 root 权限树。A set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree. - 指定要对代码组所属的代码可授予权限的代码组引用的命名的权限集的一组。A set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group. - 完全信任程序集的列表。A list of fully trusted assemblies. > [!IMPORTANT] > 请参阅对继承者的注释有关重要实现信息的类。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

exception.span: 此方法使用代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略，该策略在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已过时。

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: 若要使 CAS 策略与早期版本的 .NET Framework 兼容，请使用 [<legacyCasPolicy> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).

.property instance valuetype System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions Flags
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Flags As HostSecurityManagerOptions

summary.span: 获取表示与主机相关的安全策略组件的标志。

span.span: Gets the flag representing the security policy components of concern to the host.

value.span: 用于指定安全策略组件的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies security policy components.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此属性。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 此基实现总是返回 。The base implementation always returns . 派生的主机可以更改此属性时的一个子集值是感兴趣。The derived host can change the value of this property when only a subset of the is of interest. 可能的子集包括 none、 被拒绝的集，策略级别和程序集的证据。The possible subsets include none, the refused set, the policy level, and assembly evidence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写自定义主机安全管理器的属性。The following example shows how to override the property for a custom host security manager. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAppDomainEvidence (Type evidenceType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAppDomainEvidence(class System.Type evidenceType) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GenerateAppDomainEvidence (evidenceType As Type) As EvidenceBase
public: virtual System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase ^ GenerateAppDomainEvidence(Type ^ evidenceType);

span.span: The evidence type.

summary.span: 请求应用程序域的特定证据类型。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the application domain.

returns.span: 请求的应用程序域证据。

span.span: The requested application domain evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现返回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 公共语言运行时调用此方法时指定的类型的证据需要当前。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current . 返回的值用作主机提供的证据，并存储在集合属性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the collection of the property. 你可以使用方法来从集合中获取生成的证据。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the collection. 若要获取对此方法的回调，主机必须指定中标记出来属性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 生成的证据的此方法允许宿主延迟证据生成直到需要证据。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 版本 3.5 和更早版本中，有必要提供在加载时通过重写的证据方法。In the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我们建议你使用提供而不是重写的证据。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 调用方法时返回到仅主机具有的重写中指定的证据类型方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 返回值`null`指示主机无法生成此特定类型的证据。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写自定义主机安全管理器的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAssemblyEvidence (Type evidenceType, System.Reflection.Assembly assembly);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAssemblyEvidence(class System.Type evidenceType, class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly) cil managed
public: virtual System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase ^ GenerateAssemblyEvidence(Type ^ evidenceType, System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly);

span.span: The evidence type.
The target assembly.

summary.span: 请求程序集的特定证据类型。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the assembly.
The requested assembly evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现返回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 指定类型的证据需要当前程序集时，公共语言运行时将调用此方法。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current assembly. 返回的值用作主机提供的证据，并存储在属性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the property. 你可以使用方法来获取从生成的证据属性。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the property. 若要获取对此方法的回调，主机必须指定中标记出来属性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 生成的证据的此方法允许宿主延迟证据生成直到需要证据。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 3.5 和更早版本中，有必要提供在加载时通过重写的证据方法。In the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我们建议你使用提供而不是重写的证据。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 调用方法时返回到仅主机具有的重写中指定的证据类型方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 返回值`null`指示主机无法生成此特定类型的证据。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Type[] GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type[] GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes () As Type()
public: virtual cli::array <Type ^> ^ GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes();

summary.span: 确定主机可以为应用程序域提供哪些证据类型（如果请求了证据类型）。

span.span: Determines which evidence types the host can supply for the application domain, if requested.
An array of evidence types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现返回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 此方法返回的类型确定是否到回叫方法。The types returned by this method determine whether the method is called back into. 主机必须能够生成这种证据类型，但它可能可以，此列表中类型的状态并不意味着。The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to. 为此，最好过度指定，而不是下-指定此列表中的类型。For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.

span.span: Determines which evidence types the host can supply for the assembly, if requested.
An array of evidence types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由派生类中重写。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基实现返回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 此方法返回的类型确定是否到回叫方法。The types returned by this method determine whether the method is called back into. 主机必须能够生成这种证据类型，但它可能可以，此列表中类型的状态并不意味着。The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to. 为此，最好过度指定，而不是下-指定此列表中的类型。For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.

param.name: inputEvidence
param.span: 要添加到 证据中的附加证据。

span.span: Additional evidence to add to the evidence.

summary.span: 为正在加载的程序集提供应用程序域证据。

span.span: Provides the application domain evidence for an assembly being loaded.
The evidence to be used for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此方法。This method can be overridden in a derived class. 调用此方法时创建对象。This method is called whenever an object is created. `inputEvidence`参数是从公共语言运行时计算所得的证据。The `inputEvidence` parameter is the computed evidence from the common language runtime. 主机实现可以选择增加或减少证据。The host implementation can choose to extend or reduce the evidence. 返回值是要用于应用程序域的证据。The return value is the evidence to be used for the application domain. 基实现始终返回作为中传递的证据对象`inputEvidence`参数。The base implementation always returns the evidence object passed in as the `inputEvidence` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 请参阅对继承者的注释有关重要实现信息的类。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

span.span: The loaded assembly.

summary.span: 为正在加载的程序集提供程序集证据。

span.span: Provides the assembly evidence for an assembly being loaded.
The evidence to be used for the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在派生类中重写此方法。This method can be overridden in a derived class. 每当程序集加载时，隐式或显式，都会调用此方法。This method is called whenever an assembly is loaded, either implicitly or explicitly. 传入的参数为正在加载的程序集和从公共语言运行时计算所得的证据。The passed in parameters are the assembly being loaded, and the computed evidence from the common language runtime. 主机实现可以选择增加或减少证据。The host implementation can choose to extend or reduce the evidence. 返回值是要用于该程序集的证据。The return value is the evidence to be used for the assembly. 基实现始终返回作为中传递的证据对象`inputEvidence`参数。The base implementation always returns the evidence object passed in as the `inputEvidence` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 请参阅对继承者的注释有关重要实现信息的类。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写自定义主机安全管理器的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.PermissionSet ResolvePolicy (System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.PermissionSet ResolvePolicy(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
public: virtual System::Security::PermissionSet ^ ResolvePolicy(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ evidence);

param.name: evidence
param.span: 用于评估策略的证据集。

span.span: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: 根据指定的证据确定向代码授予什么权限。

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

returns.span: 可由安全系统授予的权限集。

span.span: The permission set that can be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用安全策略引擎，为其提供指定的证据。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with the specified evidence. 由安全策略确定结果。The result is determined by the security policy.

span.span: is .
